effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target's Attack by two stages.
This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Attack by two stages in battle.  Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text_entries.text:
戦闘中の　ポケモンの
攻撃を　それなりに　あげる。
ひっこめると　元に　戻る。

It sharply raises the Attack stat of a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

Aumenta molto l’Attacco di un Pokémon in
una lotta. L’effetto svanisce se il Pokémon
è sostituito.

Forma que adoptó Reshiram al perder su cuerpo.
Espera la llegada de un nuevo héroe.

Hebt den Angriffs-Wert eines Pokémon im Kampf
leicht an. Die Wirkung endet mit dem Austausch
des Pokémon.

Augmente un peu l’Attaque pendant un combat.
L’effet s’estompe si le Pokémon se retire.

배틀 중인 포켓몬의 공격을
그럭저럭 올린다. 포켓몬을 볼에
넣어버리면 원래대로 되돌아간다.

せんとうちゅうの　ポケモンの
こうげきを　それなりに　あげる。
ひっこめると　もとに　もどる。

It sharply raises the Attack stat of a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

It sharply raises the Attack stat of a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

Monte un peu l’Attaque pendant
un combat. L’effet s’estompe
si le Pokémon se retire.
